short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Grabillas - your screenshot and video capture history. Faster access to http://grabilla.com/my-grabillas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Grabillas history is Google Chrome browser extension that provides instant access to your screenshot and screencast capture history.

Direct link to capture history: http://grabilla.com/my-grabillas

Grabilla is screen capture and desktop video recording application. It's free, simple and fast. You can capture screenshots and upload them to our server instantly. Then you will get private screenshot link to share with your peers. Or you can share it via social network to everyone.
You can record desktop screencasts with voice comments too.

Upload and share any file: http://grabilla.com/upload

Send your feedback to info@grabilla.com
